message: I have to use my power.
I lift my head and try to focus my mind.
Just as I open my mouth, Trip appears in front of me.

name: トリップ
message: "That's not gonna work, my friend. The way your throat moves tells me when you're about to use the power."

name: ウイルス
message: "It may surprise you to learn that we're in charge of looking after Sei. Why do you think that is?"

name: ウイルス
message: "You see, we've had a few modifications done, so he can't control us with his power."

name: トリップ
message: "Never look away in a fight, man."
Trip's fist sinks into my gut. I double forward, gasping for breath.
As my legs give out, he kicks me in the back. I tumble to the floor.
